items.label: 539f6fa8ec4f024411ecd0a3
items.description:
(a)Applicability: Residential service rates shall be applicable as follows:

(1) To all electric service required for residential purposes for all domestic uses.

(2) All dwellings and apartments must be metered separately through a single meter. Commercial service rates will be applied if more than one dwelling, apartment, business or combination of these is served through one meter. Resale, breakdown or auxiliary service is not applicable hereunder.

(b)Type of service: Single-phase, 60 cycles and at any one of the town's standard service voltages. Single-phase 120/240.

Wholesale power cost adjustment: The wholesale power cost adjustment will be calculated based upon the total kwh included in the monthly bill times the adjustment per kwh for the current month, calculated in accordance with section 25-26.17 of this chapter.
items.name: Sec. 25-26.11.  Residential service
